name: Quacktown Smackdown
description: Quack Town Smack Down is a 3rd Person Arena shooter wrapped in a Goofy Rubber Duckky Toon Theme!  Hustle to pick up randomized abilities spread throughout each map to give you an advantage. The Pistol, Bubble Buckshot, Sniper Soaker, Kahuna Kreator, and Whirler all await to give you an edge over your fellow Dukkies in Free-for-All water combat! Soak the competition by utilizing Bounce pads, water abilities, and terrain. The Bubble Bathtub is the Dukkies home turf sporting colorful toys and open areas. Take it out back in the Sandbox with more verticality, tight spaces, and run-and-gun tactics.  Don't forget to customize your Dukkie's Hat, Eyes and the very rubber around their squeakers to make sure the lobby knows who the Smack Down King is!
